doc.title: John Lumia: Unauthorized
doc.plot: Actor / Writer / Performer John Lumia has been carving a niche for himself in the performance underground. This documentary short by filmmaker Ken Winikur and funded by WYBE television is a skewed and biting look at the cult of celebrity. Includes clips from "Amputation Nation" and the cult fave "Letter's from the Editor" Filmed in the style of this inimitable madman. Cool Piece.
